name: Friv Coloring Book
description:
Friv Coloring Book is multifaceted and interesting, you can paint not only one drawing - you will have a whole choice. If in some drawing it turned out not how you planned, you can change it. Enjoy!

Game made for Friv Games Site: http://frivgames.racing/friv-coloring-book.html

Control: Use the mouse on Computers. Tap buttons on-screen on Mobile Phone.
